title: Mozilla - Internet for people, not profit (US)
description: We’re working to put control of the internet back in the hands of the people using it.
text_excerpt: Mozilla - Internet for people, not profit (US) Help us improve your Mozilla experience In addition to Cookies necessary for this site to function, we’d like your permission to set some additional Cookies to better understand your browsing needs and improve your experience. Rest assured — we value your privacy. Accept A
